dcterms:description: The TIMIT dataset is used for phoneme recognition and is a standard benchmark in the field of speech recognition, containing recordings of American English speakers reading phonetically balanced sentences.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:creator: Haris Bin Zia
Agha Ali Raza
Awais Athar
dcterms:description: CSaLT is a dataset specifically designed for Urdu phoneme recognition, containing phonetically transcribed audio data that is publicly available and annotated by expert linguists.
dcterms:title: CSaLT
